lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: "Of all the forces that make a better world, none is so powerful as HOPE. With HOPE, one can think, one can work, one can dream. If you have HOPE, you have everything."
lender.occupational_info: I support, comfort and care for women at the births of their newborns - then help the women care for themselves and their babies. I love my job.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the results of the loans and want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Computer specialist

lender.name: Parvati Young
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Davin
lender.occupational_info: Cutting edge chemistry, researching faster, cheaper, more universal methods to detect chemical compounds.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I think this concept is a tremendous idea and I want to see it succeed.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in need
lender.occupational_info: I am a mature student of psychology and sociology

lender.name: Manny Cortez
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God gave me with my fellow entrepreneurs...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global packaging and distribution company. I find ways to reduce costs and increase sales by analyzing and then improving current business processes...

lender.name: Peta
lender.loan_because: It's something personal that I can do to make a difference in the life of someone who's not had my good fortune and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Financial Controller of a winery.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Because I believe one person can make a difference.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: This is what good neighbors do. These days the world is our neighborhood, so I loan these funds the same as I would loan my neighbor my ladder. What a wonderful idea Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work as best I can with someone else's donations to make sure they get to somewhere that does some good.

lender.name: shana
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at some point.
lender.occupational_info: Sales!

lender.name: Ken
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor in the U.S. equity markets

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: Too many people in this world need just a little help to get started. I've had an amazing support network with loving family and friends to help me. It's time I give a little back to the world by supporting a wonderful organization like Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I take orders from the big guy around here.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference to someone that needs a difference.

lender.name: Duncan Family
lender.loan_because: we want the world to be a better place for everyone

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Someone else has a much better use of my $100 than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping large companies become more efficient.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: In life people never want their problems solved. They want a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer, writer, and activist. I believe in helping those less fortunate as much as I can so that other people can enjoy the same kind of prosperity in life that I have enjoyed.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I am getting the unsettling notion that the massive amounts of tuition I pay for law and business school can be better spent elsewhere.

lender.name: Nicolas Mekchoudi
lender.loan_because: I believe small businesses, local trading and entrepreneurship are the most effective ways to bring social changes and help people to support themselves, develop their habitats and surroundings, send their kids to school, and in turn be role models and mentors to others in their community.

lender.name: Jonelle A.
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact in the lives of people everywhere.

lender.name: Myles
lender.occupational_info: I make drugs (oncology, immunology, and disorders of tissue growth and repair)

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Only economic justice will bring peace.

lender.name: Beto
lender.loan_because: I believe God has blessed me in so many ways which, in turn, allows me help others. I want to assist someone realize their dreams of entrepreneurship in their country.
lender.occupational_info: Music

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people better their lives.

lender.name: MATTHEW
lender.occupational_info: I train phone/data systems for businesses.

lender.name: The Asbell Family
lender.loan_because: Christ has blessed us abundantly and we hope to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Christian family of 9 in the US. Clint is an electrician and works two jobs. Wendy is a stay at home mother who homeschools our 7 children. She also sells goat's milk soap and educational books. We live on a farm and breed Chihuahuas.

lender.name: Clifford
lender.loan_because: I get pleasure out of seeing hardworking and enterprising people get a small hand up to achieve a new level of success and relative prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have problems that are too hard for them to solve by themselves.

lender.name: Tira
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to many people in the world. I am fortunate to be able to share.
lender.occupational_info: The great work of the shaman is to help and heal, to make and mend, to dwell in the heart of the mystic rose and be love in action.

lender.name: Robyn & George
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to improve their lives through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: Selling technology solutions to business

lender.name: Pam & Will
lender.loan_because: We want to help end poverty. We were inspired by Muhammad Yunus' book.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: because the world needs to change.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: A hand up is always better than a handout

lender.name: Brook
lender.loan_because: We are a global community. Many have helped me along the way, the least I can do is help others.
lender.occupational_info: I currently teach multiple subjects at a community college. Subjects range from English, Literature and History to Math and Sociology.

lender.name: Jack & Payton
lender.loan_because: We can help other people
lender.occupational_info: We sell our old toys to get money to loan. We use birthday money too.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and know the world is bigger then myself. I also know that others dont have as much as I do, but could with some assistance, so this is where I am happy to help. I also believe Kiva embraces the logic of teach man to fish principle

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: Hope and help for someone else besides my selfish self. A teenie attempt to even out the world imbalance of money.

lender.name: Emmanuela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the interior design industry doing business development for a furniture manufacturer.

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: loaning money makes a difference to hardworking people who are trying to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Software marketing

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: A small amount to me can make a big difference to someone else.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I am able to make a small difference in the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small business where we design and develop web (computer) applications.

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: it seems like it can benefit others. and besides i need the good karma for my next illusory life!
lender.occupational_info: i watch children misbehave for a living.

lender.name: Wells & Stephana
lender.occupation: Human Resource Manager , Small Business owner
lender.loan_because:
To improve the lifes of others
"Speak of Health, Happiness & Prosparity to everyone you meet"

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I love to share our stories. We all need to help each other and when we share from our hearts, we help make everyone stronger.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public health at the medical school in Oregon, USA. And, with my friends in the photo (I am on the right) we paint together and turn our art into products we sell to our community to raise funds to share with others.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I don't have enough money to justify opening a savings account. So - i'm not loosing any interest by lending the little money i have to hard working businesspeople who need the help. I have served over 500 hours with the American Red Cross, and sponsor 2 children in Honduras through the Christian Childrens' Fund. I enjoy helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be an on-site computer instructor. I drove to people's homes & businesses and taught them how to use new hardware, software, and internet applications.

lender.name: Jaimie & Matt
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I believe in human potential and know that efforts rewarded will benefit all of us over time.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses tell their stories about how their service or product will benefit the people who use them.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and believe I should give back when I can.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe the best rewards comes to those to actively pursue them.
lender.occupational_info: I make films.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It helps enable people who want to help themselves. I think it is very honorable to have a dream to expand your buisness in order to better yourself and your family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a corrections officer in a jail that houses around 100 inmates year round. The jail is in a community with a population of 50,000. We see a wide variety of offenders from simple larceny charges to murder.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life and there are those who need help. I hope they are all successful.
lender.occupational_info: I now help school systems with their classroom technology and play guitar with a bluegrass band.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate for what I have and I want others to feel just as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the last semester of High School.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because:
Because..........
My mother made me!
lender.occupational_info: I am in Senior high school. Learning French and English. Making plans to visit Cuba very very soon.....Again

lender.name: Baeleigh
lender.loan_because: I feel bad, that others don't have what they need. I want to help them. We should help and most certainly can.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in school, learning French and Spanish as second and third languages.

lender.name: Maggi R
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I think it is important for everyone to get what they want, every once in a while. I am making a difference, one loan at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I am in Junior High, I am on the honor role, I work hard to excel in school, so that I can travel and help others. I am learning French and Spanish as second and third languages.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: This is a much better and more involving way of giving to charity. Put money into a faceless collecting tin give you no feed back. love chhsing who my money goes to and watching their progress.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the obligation of every American to share the wealth we are blessed with. I may not have much, but many people have much less.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be able to follow my heart and dreams by working as a fine artist. My medium is primarily paint (acrylic and oil) and as well as sculpture and some photography.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I hope to help and improve the human condition. I also enjoy helping those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: A filmmaker who believes in a better tomorrow and would like to replace fear with hope.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I like helping people make their dreams come true, if I can, even if it's just in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am working toward a B.S. Degree in Business Administration. I'm in my second semester. This is the start of a career change for me. I'm also looking for part time work.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It is a simple and inexpensive way for individuals to act collectively and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed by BT, a UK based provider of telecommunications services.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing for the world. I feel, as someone as fortunate as I, it is a duty to donate and loan to the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I program for the Nintendo DS and Wii;

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
This was a Christmas gift from my sister in lieu of a tradtional gift exchange. I'm thrilled to be able to put my gift to good use and look forward to an ongoing relationship with KIVA.
I was recently on a trip to Cambodia and was captured by the warm spirit and friendliness of the people there - seeing how hard everyone worked day in and day out was a life changing experience for me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large architecture firm in Minneapolis, MN where I help design, coordinate and manage construction projects for large corporations.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a chance for a good life. I am happy to help.

lender.name: Brenna
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have been born in the United States and to have a good job. Loaning is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage payments to my company, and make sure our bills are paid. I also approve new vendors.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: Whenever I start to feel depressed, or I think that life is hard, I go to Kiva to gain perspective. You can make such a difference in someone else's life with so little investment - it's very uplifting.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Stewardship of what God provides mandates that His allowances to one be shared for the benefit for all of His children
lender.occupational_info: Consulting with Retail Merchants to improve their business

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount really can make a difference in numbers !

lender.name: Staffan
lender.loan_because: I want to support fellow entrepreneurs globally. We make the world a better place and encourage innovation.
lender.occupational_info: I have experience in printing, automotive, and currently working in aerospace. I'm an innovator and thrive on developing new electromechanical systems for aircraft's.

lender.name: Aerin
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. I live in an incredible location, have an amazing family, and I am able to seek education and other aspirations without thinking twice. I know that life isn't this easy everywhere, and if all it takes is a little bit of help to get someone on their feet, then it is my responsibility to help. I prefer a "hand up" approach to charity as opposed to a "hand out" approach, and Kiva exemplifies my philosophy on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to learn about the environment and ways that we can improve and help the world to ensure that it will stay beautiful for future generations. In order to pay for my schooling, I work at a law firm which specializes in lender liability, meaning that we hold big banks and other corporations accountable when they try to cheat their customers.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I desire to help hardworking people accross the world who need to support themselves and their families. I want to show Jesus Christ's love to those who perhaps wouldn't have a chance otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just finishing high school and will be entering college--probably a Bible college or to get my teaching credential.

lender.name: Leigh-Ann
lender.loan_because: When I travelled I saw so many wonderful things and beautiful people that were always friendly and helpful. I want to return the favour!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to assist those in my department which I like doing. The bonus is that I work in sports which adds to the fun of the day.

lender.name: HeidiB
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office making sure everything gets done for the business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: with our help, they can achieve their dreams.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to have a better life
lender.occupational_info: I like being face to face with customers and helping them with their buying decisions

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who works to make sure medical products are safe.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: Active duty military & small business owner
lender.loan_because:
I know how tough it is to start a business without help in the U.S., and I can believe it is even more difficult in other parts of the world.
Some great people believed in me and helped me on my way, so I now want to pass that help on to someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I own two small businesses. One is a pizza & sub shop, the other is a rental business servicing college students. I am also currently serving on active duty with the U.S. Army in Michigan.

lender.name: djalma
lender.loan_because: Porque a burocracia de um emprestimo para ser pequeno revendedor muito dificil, principalmente pelas exigencias e altos juros.
lender.occupational_info: meu trabalho compreende de comprar a um ou mais distribuidor e realizar a revenda. Hoje tenho a oportunidade de ser representante e distribuidor direto de uma grande empresa, o que definitivamente daria condies de manter minha familia(esposa e trs filhos menores), bem como ajudar de maneira geral minha familia e pessoas que esto como eu: sem dinheiro e querendo apenas um patrocinador para que possamos viver dignamente no Brasil.

lender.name: Mae
lender.loan_because: I would like to see folks with good ideas, but no money be able to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 34 years, now retired and am a part time body worker; i.e. massage and watsu, a warm water massage.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today. African proverb

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe that the ownership of property by individuals; capitalism; access to capital; individual effort and, the ability to keep a maximum amount of the rewards of ones efforts are the key to prosperity and happiness for the most people.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses grow larger.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I believe this innovative solution to eradicate poverty through dignity can make a substantial impact one loan at the time. Thank you for the opportunity you are giving me to participate in this cause!
lender.occupational_info: As Managing Director of a Localization and Language Services Provider I am responsible for overall office performance and profitability, that includes client satisfaction, project management, contractual arrangements with all companies and also developing opportunities for new business.

lender.name: Quantum Enterprises
lender.loan_because: It's a nice thing to do
lender.occupational_info: idk it says describe ur work, wow like job or wat? go look at the link to the website

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others by helping them obtain their dreams or goals to make thier life any bit easier.
lender.occupational_info: I help build structures that provide electricity to homes, manufacturing companies, and other community buildings.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to help people accomplish their dreams. I think it's especially nice that these loans not only help the small business owners, but also everyone in their communities that will benefit from their services.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a local university studying English. I hope to become a teacher. I am also a stay at home mom with my two sons Isaac and Isaiah.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, work hard and try to stay out of trouble.

lender.name: Ruslan
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to open my own business and know the challenges as well as the rewards facing anyone brave enough to take the big step. I hope my loan helps the recipient(s) reach their goals.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do and tohelp my grandchildren understand the needs of many people.
lender.occupational_info: Fundraiser

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: my daughters are from Africa (Ethiopia) and I believe I have an obligation to help other Africans. It is my hope that someday, Kiva will have some Ethiopian entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I type notes for doctors; if you see a doctor in the United States, a note has to be typed for that visit.

lender.name: Kesh
lender.loan_because: the NEED of those living in poverty is more important than the constant fulfillment of one's own DESIRES.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses succeed through technology and financial management.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that one person can make a difference and that we're all in this world together.

lender.name: Roxann
lender.occupational_info: I help people tell their stories with their photos and words.

lender.name: Steve and Hope
lender.loan_because: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it. - John D. Rockerfeller
lender.occupational_info: "When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another." Helen Keller

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I hope it does some good and spreads some good will.
lender.occupational_info: zzzzzzzzzzzz :)

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I think everybody deserves a chance to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others with the blessings God has given me. I believe in micro-lending. I am excited that I am now able to be a micro-lender myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of Geography.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being a silent partner in an effort that helps small businesses develop in other regions of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the electric industry helping to deliver electricity to homes and businesses.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to see jobs created, women and children employed and self sustainable and the work improve the environment
lender.occupational_info: New project development, partnership development

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the responsible thing to do with your time and money. Helping others as you were helped.
lender.occupational_info: I was in human resource management for 25 years. I ensured employees were treated with equality.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to have a successful business in Las Vegas and love to watch other people follow their dreams and create their own business
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion for animals and I have a business that allows me to work with animals on a daily basis

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I read about KIVA in Bill Clinton's book 'Giving' and I think it's an amazing idea. I don't have a lot of money to give right now, but I wanted to be able to help people less fortunate than me and I thought this was a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in the Biology department at the University of Buffalo. Right now I'm studying cell biology and genetics and I hope to get a PhD in Biology so I can do research and teach.

lender.name: fran
lender.loan_because: I just want to see other women be successful in daily living. This is by feeding their families and creating positive self esteems to be passed on through generations.
lender.occupational_info: l help people of all ages take care of their special smiles.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in an operating room in a hospital.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I want to help make others' dreams come true.

lender.name: Tynisha
lender.loan_because: I want to loan because my dream has always been to go to Africa and become an OBGYN and further help discover a cure for AIDs, so loaning is my way of helping. I LOVE YOU AFRICA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I help mentally and physically disabled people live there everyday lives. I cook, clean and teach them everyday things.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the ability to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach on days when another teacher cannot make it. I'm called a substitute. At nights, I take classes at university. On Fridays I run a youth group where young people get together, eat, talk and smile.

lender.name: Howard and Marcia
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed and now want to help others realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that manages financial assets for our clients.

lender.name: Anchorage South Rotary
lender.loan_because: Innovative way to help aspiring business owners.

lender.name: Ann & Bob
lender.loan_because: We're inspired by people pursuing a dream. This is a way we can help someone reach theirs.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Isaiah 58:6-8
lender.occupational_info: I help students find an education at the college level.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: it's an amazing way to make a difference. It's almost ridiculous not to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I keep financial records for small businesses.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: God and my parents were good to me and I am grateful to them. I am fortunate to be in position to help someone else and I enjoy doing it.

lender.name: Sherrice
lender.loan_because: I have the desire and ability to share.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hairstylist by trade. However I enjoy the friendships that have blossomed because of my personal connections with others.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: a lot of people need someone to believe in them enough to give themselves a chance to better their own lives. I think we need a little more trust in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student going to school so that I may eventually be an international volunteer coordinator.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by many people, so I want others.
lender.occupational_info: I design equipment that is used to protect workers from chemical fumes.

lender.name: Anh
lender.loan_because: people should be given an opportunity to have a better life.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I need to do something positive.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I love people.

lender.name: Hazel
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I identify efficiencies so we can invest funds in growth areas.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I've lived in dire straits for many years and I know how it feels.
lender.occupational_info: Political activist

lender.name: Bella and Jo
lender.loan_because: To make a modest contribution toward the effort of a more fair redistribution of wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychotherapist and an educator.

lender.name: Abbie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Miki
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that microfinance is the best way to reduce poverty and empower individuals around the world

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: It is important to ensure these entrepreneurs continue to have funds available to transform their lives and communities during this global depression.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for work in management and technology consulting.

lender.name: Rashmi
lender.loan_because: my small contribution might change someone's fate and lead to a quality life.
lender.occupational_info: The best example to show this world, that still Humanity is alive.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: There are many more less fortunate than myself. We're all working together to help those in need, one loan at a time.

lender.name: Kyle&Holly
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate in our lives, especially to have each other. We have been looking for an opportunity to help others that have the drive to better themselves by working hard, not just with a hand-out.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: helping people makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I'm a nanny. I spend my days watching a fast growing little boy.

lender.name: David Hall
lender.loan_because: All people that are living in abundance have a moral and spiritual obligation to live beyond themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of an Assembly of God church in Adelaide, South Australia. I love seeing people have a go and fulfill their God-given destiny.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fulfill their destiny and make life better for their families.

lender.name: Lucia & Team 57
lender.occupation: I am a mentor on Team 57 (a FIRST robotics team)

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: I get to help people around the world. And I get to be an "international financier" to boot. The internet is an amazing thing...
lender.occupational_info: I help people with computers.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I hope to help empower women, eradicate poverty, and make a difference in the everyday lives of hardworking people around the world.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I love giving back to my local community, so I want to give back to my global community.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a nightclub in a suburban local. I get to interact with many interesting people and help them enjoy themselves while they are in my company. I started my business when i was only 16 so i know what it's like to be a starting business owner and that through hard work and determination with a little faith we can all achieve the success we desire.

lender.name: Auralis
lender.loan_because:
Auralis is an up and coming rock band with global conciousness.
"For whom much is given; much is expected."
We love to give away some of our profits to help our fellow brothers and sisters around the world!
lender.occupational_info:
We are a keyboard based rock band. Two classically trained pianists who have performed all over the world...and a drummer :)
We are not looking for publicity for this...we are genuine in our interests and are glad to be helping those less fortunate than ourselves!

lender.name: M & R
lender.loan_because: We are lucky to have what we have and we'd like to be a small part of helping someone else make a living.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm fortunate enough to have money I can spare, and I want to use it to help others.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: it's a great concept- nice to see and read about the people getting the loans.
lender.occupational_info: build new homes, renovate existing homes, rental property, sell property to buyers

lender.name: John Moyes
lender.loan_because: I have just turned 75. I have everything I could wish for,whilst half the world is often doing without even the basics.We must share!.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a motorcar business as a manager.

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people achieve their dreams and goals.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I wish this service were around when I was younger
lender.occupational_info: I educate Realtors and Lenders so they can better market themselves and their listings to consumers

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: It is exotic and fun

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving to others to help them achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I sell gourmet foods at home taste-testing parties. I also stay home and raise my 2 beautiful daughters.

lender.name: Lupita
lender.loan_because: I want to give some thing back to the people who work hard and just kneed some one to give them a hand so they can beter there working conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay home wife /painter / interior designer.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because:
Its time for a humanitarian revolution. The great advancements society has made in the past in other areas must now be made in the area of human dignity.
Its time to eliminate extreme poverty and all its horrible implications.
Now, more than ever, this revolution is possible.
We dont lack resources, only will. We dont lack ability, only determination. We dont lack opportunities, only action.
lender.occupational_info: I run a website that sells magnet mailers.

lender.name: Danelle
lender.loan_because: someone gave me a great gift certificate and I wanted to pass it along!
lender.occupational_info: I help people organize their finances so they can budget and plan better, pay bills on time, and save for special goals.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.occupational_info: I do Video production, editing, motion graphics as a full time job and a part time freelance.

lender.name: Tennessee Family
lender.loan_because: A hand up always helps more than a hand out. No matter what society one lives in, self reliance breeds dignity and strengthens families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: We are blessed to take care of the sick and injured.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Because I can
lender.occupational_info: I turn common Molds, Spores, and Fungus into Gold using a secret formula I recently discovered while exploring ancient Mayan sites.

lender.name: lynn
lender.loan_because: I can help someone out there, who has been much less fortunate than me.

lender.name: ron and margie
lender.loan_because: I believe in microeconomics.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants. Margie helps me in the classroom. We also like to do Habitat for Humanity.

lender.name: Stanley Lam
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in other countries the opportunity to succeed and make the most of their lives, when those opportunities might otherwise never be available to them.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Nathanael CJE Culver
lender.loan_because: I can, I should. I must.
lender.occupational_info: After spending nearly ten years in Taiwan as an English educator, I've now relocated to Shanghai, China. My family consists of my wife and the sunshine of my life, 4-year-old Emma.

lender.name: Keke
lender.loan_because: Now is my time to give back!

lender.name: Waithira Stewart
lender.loan_because:
Who does not want a little help, esp. so when someone ask for it....
I just want to... Don't you?
lender.occupational_info: Putting a smile on someone's face... priceless

lender.name: Hailey
lender.loan_because: every act of kindness helps and that is what the world needs a lot of these days.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school for cultural anthropology and art. I work waiting tables in a restaurant.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people as often as possible, as meaningfully as possible, and as effectively as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an incredible bike shop in Rochester Hills, Michigan. They let me talk to customers all day, sell them bikes, and--most charitably--they let me race while wearing their team uniform. I'm also a student, working towards a second degree that will lead toward my future career in youth grief counseling. Having earned my first degree in philosophy I hope to use my talents, passions and interests to influence the world towards a more ethical view of politics, economics and social interaction. I hope that I am, and will become, an instrument of peace and equity.

lender.name: Melissa in Oregon
lender.loan_because: We have a successful small business & want to see others have that opportunity. We are all one world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I have a small business that manufactures various parts for other companies & their products.

lender.name: Julie Tampus
lender.loan_because: i want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Anett
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help someone out there have a better life and maybe fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: I hope to support a worthy cause.
lender.occupational_info: My work speaks for itself. Just take a look at my homepage.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: To help make the life of others better. And for the ones that want to work to make it better for them and others, BRAVO!

lender.name: Degobar
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: If you give a person a fish he eats for one day. If you teach a person how to fish, he can eat for ever.

lender.name: Branimir Pukari
lender.loan_because:
I'm doing my share to do something good.
Kiva is really a revolutionary way of supporting people in need throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a lawyer.

lender.name: katia
lender.loan_because: quero iniciar uma pequena empresa de transporte
lender.occupational_info: Realizar fretes de mercadorias em geral e mudanas

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I had a fairly privileged upbringing and want to acknowledge the advantages I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Americorps in a public high school facilitating an after school program.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: investing in a project is more sustainable than donating in the long run.
lender.occupational_info: I design communication and Earth observation satellites.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.occupational_info: - I work with seniors and the elderly.

lender.name: Kim A
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in so many ways. I feel we are called to help those less fortunate than ourselves. Kiva is a wonderful way to make a difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate by a very generous person to put to good use and make me able to help others in need.

lender.name: Janice & Kollol
lender.occupational_info: Janice (lawyer); Kollol (business)

lender.name: Edmund Paul
lender.loan_because: I need money to have my own buy & sell store in our local town & build online store as well for wider market. Please help since this is the only way I can feed my family. Reassured payment of loan will either be on or before deadlines.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelancer of almost anything... from buying & selling variety goods through fee-based services using my computer skills. Bad thing is that not every week I can sell & have clients to feed my family.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I would like to be part of improving something.
lender.occupational_info: Help people with computers and computers with people.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's a personal way to help folks who are striving to improve their lives... and a rising tide lifts all boats.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the written word, creating stories, books, film scripts.

lender.name: DONOVAN
lender.loan_because: I loan to buy land in for residential development.Huge profits can be expected.
lender.occupational_info: Providing decent living conditions at affordable prices.

lender.name: Kala
lender.occupation: digital content producer, social business fan
lender.loan_because: to connect to others worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I explore ways to use digital video as a communication and education tool, leveraging different platforms to reach specific audiences with relevant messaging. Right now I'm interested in participatory communication projects with user generated content via peer-to-peer interaction in stressed communities.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I want a better world for my children to grow up in.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to assist women in developing countries to gain dignity by starting their own businesses and thereby contributing to their families and wider community.
lender.occupational_info: In my previous work I helped children/teens in the public school system. Now I support social justice by contributing to Kiva, writing a blog, singing in a chorus devoted to world/social justice music, writing letters to my Congressman and speaking out against injustice.

lender.name: Cherish
lender.loan_because: I want my clients' investments to have a positive impact on the world albeit indirectly. Every piece of land they buy helps one entrepreneur lift themselves up from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people double their investments in a 4 to 6 year period by investing in developing lands within the city limits.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to impact change in the world, and help others help themselves out of extreme poverty.

lender.name: The Galitas
lender.loan_because: what Kiva is doing is wonderful. I am sure that many of the recipients & businesses that Kiva works with would not normally be able to get these loans. God has blessed our family with so much and we want to give back.

lender.name: bernie
lender.loan_because: it's better than donating one time. i can help a lot of people. they get a "hand up" not a "hand out"

lender.name: Paul & Chris
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are ready to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations learn how to teach and learn using computers.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of this world. I loan because I know there are people who are willing to work hard for their families and their communities and they just need help getting started. I loan because I believe in Christ's message of grace, not just the grace of the Father but of social grace and justice.
lender.occupational_info: I help and encourage teenagers and their families to trust in Jesus Christ, to care for the world, and to honor God with their lives.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: $25 probably means a lot more to the person who is receiving the loan than it does to me.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: There is enough pain in the world. Maybe by me giving something positive back, I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the information technology field. I also enjoy writing and creating art for comics to entertain children and adults alike.

lender.name: The Ash Family
lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is my duty as a christian to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: construction inspector

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: So little can achieve so much
lender.occupational_info: We look for improvement opportunities in a variety of businesses.

lender.name: choo
lender.loan_because: we all need to share more.
lender.occupational_info: i am an artist of many mediums.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is like a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: This is great idea. Helping people to support themselves and their families with small businesses is a long term good not just a quick fix.
lender.occupational_info: I am a landscape photographer in Scotland.

lender.name: Daisy and Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to take action to relieve the suffering in Africa. I think of how bad the situation is for people there and try to imagine how I would feel if I was in their position, and all that comes to mind is "HELP"! With my tiny loan, I'm trying to be that help and I'm confident that a lot of tiny helps will add up to one BIG HELP for the people of Africa.

lender.name: Junior Troop #8682
lender.loan_because: We care about our friends throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a 4th grade Junior Girl Scout Troop in the Greater Los Angeles Council. Go Scouts!

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredit support
lender.occupational_info: IT technician in a Chemical Industry (Italy)

lender.name: Marijke de Nier
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur too

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: As a child I have lived in Bauchi, Bayara, Nigeria for 4 years. It's been 27 years ago when my parents, my sister and I left. My parents worked as docters against lepracy, at the Bayara General Hospital in Bauchi. Because I have good memories to that time and know where my roots are from I wish to do a good thing for those who need the extra support. There for I signed up at Kiva.org
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business in carpentry and wish to help an other carpenter or farmer in central Nigeria.

lender.name: Brigitta
lender.loan_because: From experience i know how hard it is to start of your own business. I hope my small contribution will help others to reach their goals.

lender.name: Bowe
lender.loan_because: It's a great and safe way to help out other people who could use a small amout of your money to start/build something useful!
lender.occupational_info: Creative designer

lender.name: olaleye
lender.loan_because: please kiva.org i am in need of loan of $ 3,500 inother for me to set-up a small scale business and invest it in forex or stock market business.
lender.occupational_info: i am a electrican / electronic engineering student and an investor on a stock market business

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Every single person on this planet deserves a comfortable life style where the next meal, shelter or medical care are not an all consuming daily struggle. These basic human needs are not exclusive.
lender.occupational_info: I manage all the financial aspects for a medical construction company. It can be tedious at times but ultimately it is rewarding knowing that I assist at keeping the company financially sound so that everyone involved can prosper.

lender.name: Joppe
lender.loan_because: people across the world need a little help realising their dreams. I was fortunate to be born in a country where it's a lot easier to do so. It also raises the quality of my own life and my feeling of happiness to be able to help people less fortunate.

lender.name: Mike & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We're blessed with the resources to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for a large college as educators.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Jurrit
lender.loan_because: Just to help out!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I love to help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I drive a tractor/trailer within a 200 mile range of my home in Missouri.

lender.name: Madeleine Jane
lender.loan_because: I hope it will make a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English for specific purposes

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Share your wealth !!! I really hope that this system will work for all the small entrepeneurs who dare to start a business! Great feeling that we can help these people.
lender.occupational_info: pfff..give me a break !! (or two)

lender.name: Iwan
lender.occupational_info: Grafic productionmanager

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I reconcile trades on a daily basis. I make sure the cash and trade positions are booked correctly on our books. I price securities, as well as book corporate actions.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: This has the most impact upon individual people to make their daily lives better than they were before.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderfully efficient and straightforward way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the development of academic and community-based systems, curricula, and public policy that promotes primary health care as a way of improving access to health care for underserved populations.

lender.name: Jolanda
lender.loan_because: Not everybody is as fortunate to be born in good circumstances. I was, and for me it is important to share. And also it feels really good to support!

lender.name: Johan& Esther
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who aren't able to start their own bussiness to make a living. With only a small amount we can help them change their lives . It feels good to give!

lender.name: Seydun
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps

lender.name: Laura and Keith
lender.loan_because: I have a lot and they have nothing. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Student at a high school for performing and creative art. I study visual arts. I also play drums.

lender.name: Milo
lender.loan_because: If I was in there situation and needed help, I would hope that someone would be able to help me or my family.
lender.occupational_info: I build custom homes here in Hawaii.
